about.title: Who Am I?
about.paragraph_management: With solid management experience, I notably spent 5 years at John Paul leading a team of 7 concierges. During this period, I structured the team by implementing comprehensive processes for coaching, onboarding, continuous training, and personalized support, thereby developing sharp skills in leadership and talent development.
about.paragraph_agency: In parallel, since 2018, I founded and run my digital marketing agency, MDMC Music Ads. We support over a hundred clients in the strategic development and engagement of their online fanbase.
about.paragraph_results: Our digital expertise has generated tangible results: over 1,500 campaigns launched, 34 million cumulative views, and solid engagement rates between 4 and 8%. My specialty: transforming interest into a community of loyal and active fans.
about.paragraph_synthesis: Today, I leverage this dual expertise - managerial and digital -, data-driven and results-oriented, to help structure your teams and grow your project.
